    • Method Detail

      • canRelocate

        boolean canRelocate​(Program program)
        Returns true if this relocation handler can relocate the given program. For example, an ELF program requires an ELF-specific relocation handler.
        Parameters:
        program - the program to relocation
        Returns:
        true if this relocation handler can relocate the given program

      • relocate

        void relocate​(Program program,
              MemoryBlock block,
              Address newStartAddress,
              TaskMonitor monitor)
       throws MemoryAccessException
        Relocates the memory block to the new start address. All relocations in the memory block will be fixed-up.
        Parameters:
        program -
        block -
        newStartAddress -
        monitor -
        Throws:
        MemoryAccessException
